name: Juicy Underwater Invaders
description:
Welcome to Juicy Underwater Invaders, a game created to show the importance of sound design and visual effects in video game development.

This Project was made for the rendering of a course. The Objective was to create a space invaders and to integrate visual and sound effects into it to amplify the desired emotions and feelings. Here, our intentions were to create a scary and oppressive feeling.

We have therefore developed several effects that can be activated or not to fully appreciate their importance.

How To Play :

Movements Left and Right : A / D or Left Arrow / Right Arrow
Fire a Torpedo : Space Bar
Enable / Disable Effects : F1 to F8

The Team :

Game Designers : Oscar Chenevier - Loïc Lanternier - Antoine Person

Game Artist : Etienne Niemiec

Game Programmers : Cédric Chauvin - Thibaut Guerin
